title: Vegetarian Mushroom Stuffing
ingredients: ['500g (1 1/4 lb) fresh mushrooms', '100g (4 oz) butter or margarine', '2 onions, diced', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '1 teaspoon savoury seasoning', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1.25kg (2 3/4 lb) dried breadcrumbs', '350ml (12 fl oz) hot vegetable stock', '2 eggs or 4 egg whites, beaten', '4 apples - cored, peeled and chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
